import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List Apps"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/user-svc/apps"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



List apps. Role, user ID or contact ID must be specified.

Requires the `user-svc:app:view` permission, which by default all users have.
Caller can only list apps of roles they own (unless they are an admin).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"host":{"items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"},"ids":{"items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"}},"type":"object"}}},"description":"List Apps Request","required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Apps listed successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"apps":{"items":{"properties":{"host":{"type":"string"},"id":{"type":"string"}},"required":["host","id"],"type":"object"},"type":"array"}},"required":["apps"],"type":"object"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object"}}}},"500":{"description":"Internal Server Error","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
